title: AAA study ranks mental distraction of using iPhone voice commands on the road vs other platforms
text:
AAA study ranks mental distraction of using iPhone voice commands on the road vs other platforms 
Published By: 9to5mac.com - Today 
In its continued research into distracted driving, the American Automobile Association (AAA) today published the results of its latest study...
